CHAT.comment: WW's father is laid off for a few months and is now home during the day to take care of WW while his mother works part-time. In this visit, they are both home. It is a Tuesday afternoon and there is no television programming, so the mother of XingXing, a little boy about the same age as WW comes by to visit about halfway through this recording. WW spends a great deal of time jealously guarding his toys against XX's intrusion while their 2 mothers talk.
WW and his family live in a factory-provided low-rise apartment building.

clause.a: m walks over to wipe ww's nose
grunting; ww walks back into living room
